018package org.opengis.temporal;
019
020import java.time.Duration;
021import java.time.temporal.TemporalAmount;
022import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
023import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.ISO_19108;
024
025
026/**
027 * <strong>Effectively deprecated</strong> — use {@code java.time.Duration} instead.
028 * This interface defined by ISO 19108 represents the duration of a period in ISO 8601 format.
029 * As of GeoAPI 3.1, this interface is replaced by the {@link TemporalAmount} interface from
030 * the standard Java time API, or by the {@link Duration} specialization.
031 * {@code PeriodDuration} is kept in GeoAPI 3.1 for compatibility reasons but will be removed in GeoAPI 4.0.
032 *
033 * @since 2.3
034 *
035 * @see TemporalAmount
036 * @see Duration
037 *
038 * @version 3.1
039 */
040@UML(identifier="TM_PeriodDuration", specification=ISO_19108)
041public interface PeriodDuration extends TemporalAmount {
042}
